Earth.description: Orbiting Earth, the fractured home of humanity. The once-beautiful world lies fractured, but humanity persists in the ruins of the kilko disaster.

subDestinations.name: New York Sector
Downtown Core
subDestinations.description: The center of the rebuilt New York. High-tech skyscrapers meet low-lying housing complexes.

subDestinations.name: Core Zone
subDestinations.description: The economic engine of the city, filled with trade towers and zero-g lifts.

subDestinations.name: Outer Core
subDestinations.description: A mix of residential towers and repurposed old-world buildings.

subDestinations.name: Torta Excavation Site
subDestinations.description: Ongoing digs into ancient megastructure debris unearthed beneath New York.

subDestinations.name: Skyline Transit Nexus
subDestinations.description: A massive floating station for vertical transit between layers of the city.
A massive sprawling city rebuilt after the Kilko disaster. Its modern layout supports trade and excavation.

subDestinations.name: Earth Space Port
Processing
subDestinations.description: Entry zone for civilian and cargo inspection.

subDestinations.name: Core Zone
subDestinations.description: Admin offices and AI control stations.

subDestinations.name: Outer Core
subDestinations.description: Overflow waiting bays and shuttle terminals.

subDestinations.name: Cargo Intake
subDestinations.description: Freight and military shipments arrive here for unloading.

subDestinations.name: Docking Bay
subDestinations.description: Where ships refuel, dock, and load passengers.
A large cargo and civilian port that once fueled the Red War, now a hub for mega city trade.

subDestinations.name: Pacific Research Facility
subDestinations.description: A massive floating research base investigating Kilko artifacts and deep-sea anomalies.

Mars.description: Orbiting Mars Colony Alpha, a sprawling network of habitats and terraforming stations.

subDestinations.name: Colony Core
subDestinations.description: The heart of Martian habitation and terraforming, full of life and engineering.

subDestinations.name: Residential Dome
subDestinations.description: Living quarters for colonists. Dome-shaped, self-sustaining habitat.

subDestinations.name: Central Market
subDestinations.description: Bustling commercial hub with local produce, electronics, and black market items.

subDestinations.name: Power Hub
subDestinations.description: Power station for life support and terraforming systems.

subDestinations.name: Core Zone
subDestinations.description: The nuclear fusion chamber and AI coolant control.

subDestinations.name: Outer Core
subDestinations.description: Backups and auxiliary power coils.

subDestinations.name: Terraforming Fields
subDestinations.description: Sprawling fields of atmosphere processors converting Mars into something livable.

subDestinations.name: Ancient Vault
subDestinations.description: The site of a mysterious pre-human vault unearthed after the Kilko event.

Jupiter.description: Orbiting the Jupiter Orbital Station, a gateway to the planet’s storms and gas resources.

subDestinations.name: Storm Observatory
subDestinations.description: Observes Jupiter’s massive storms and shields orbitals by adjusting their paths.

subDestinations.name: Sensor Array
subDestinations.description: Measures electromagnetic and particle fields from storms.

subDestinations.name: Atmospheric Lab
subDestinations.description: Researchers live here studying Jupiter’s impossible weather.

subDestinations.name: Core Zone
subDestinations.description: Main control center with real-time planetary feedback.

subDestinations.name: Outer Core
subDestinations.description: Backup monitoring stations with limited access.

subDestinations.name: Gas Harvesting Platform
subDestinations.description: Station that siphons valuable gases for fusion fuel and life support.

subDestinations.name: Research Array
subDestinations.description: Drone-controlled scientific sensors deployed across Jupiter’s upper atmosphere.

subDestinations.name: Deep Core Relay
subDestinations.description: Communications hub buried in Jupiter's atmosphere linking all deep exploration teams.

subDestinations.name: Excavation Platforms
subDestinations.description: Structures digging into ancient rings within the gas giant for lost tech.

Europa.description: Orbiting Europa Research Base, a scientific station monitoring the icy moon’s hidden ocean.

subDestinations.name: Research Base
subDestinations.description: Core base for studying Europa’s subsurface ocean and megastructures.

subDestinations.name: Subsurface Tunnels
subDestinations.description: Ancient tunnels found beneath the ice. Partly mapped, mostly feared.

subDestinations.name: AI Lab
subDestinations.description: Research and development for off-world AI behavior and containment.

subDestinations.name: Core Chamber
subDestinations.description: A deep, partially flooded cavern where megastructures converge.

subDestinations.name: Core Zone
subDestinations.description: Sealed research zone inside a massive glacial dome.

subDestinations.name: Outer Core
subDestinations.description: Dark outer rim where signals often go dead.

subDestinations.name: Ground Camp
subDestinations.description: Temporary field base for drilling and sample retrieval.

subDestinations.name: Ruins
subDestinations.description: Ancient megastructure buried under kilometers of ice, predating humanity.

Andromeda.description: Orbiting the Andromeda Outpost, a forward base for deep space exploration.

subDestinations.name: Forward Recon Station
subDestinations.description: Unmanned outpost tracking deep-space threats and anomalies.

subDestinations.name: Black Spire Relay
subDestinations.description: Long-distance quantum signal relay — its origins remain unclear.

subDestinations.name: Xeno Archives
subDestinations.description: Vault of alien artifacts and cryptic data recovered from ruins.

subDestinations.name: Statue Research Wing
subDestinations.description: Massive chamber of alien statues; many researchers claim the statues move.

Vega.description: Orbiting Vega Prime, a vibrant star system hub untouched by disaster.

subDestinations.name: Capital City
subDestinations.description: A neon metropolis and trade center thriving beyond Sol.

subDestinations.name: Tech District
subDestinations.description: Startup hubs and AI incubation vaults run by private corps.

subDestinations.name: Underdeck Market
subDestinations.description: Black market hub for rare parts and unauthorized implants.

subDestinations.name: Central Core
subDestinations.description: The brain of the city — central processors and energy grid.

subDestinations.name: Core Zone
subDestinations.description: City’s operating AI and political centers.

subDestinations.name: Outer Core
subDestinations.description: Surrounding cyber zones with heavy data traffic.

subDestinations.name: Orbital Trade Ring
subDestinations.description: Ring-shaped station for trade, deals, and occasional piracy.

subDestinations.name: Stellar Observation Spire
subDestinations.description: This spire was the first to detect the incoming megastructures.

subDestinations.name: Crystal Canyon Outpost
subDestinations.description: Gem mines deep in Vega's crust — rumored to house alien tech.
